features: 🍊 Best Gentle Daily Face Wash – Start your day with this versatile Facial Cleanser that works deep within your pores for a Clear, Healthy Complexion without drying or stripping your skin of its natural nutrients. Clinically Tested for the most Potent Defense against Excess Oil, Blackheads & Blemishes. Anti-aging properties combat Fine Lines & Wrinkles, leaving your skin soft & supple. Whether your skin is Normal, Dry, Sensitive, or Oily, this face scrub is safe and effective for daily use.

🍃 Green Tea Matcha and Vitamin C – No other phytonutrient contains more antioxidants than pure Green Tea Matcha. When coupled with 15% Vitamin C, it's a match-a made in heaven! These Antioxidant & Clarifying Powerhouses fight free radicals, impurities & sun damage while boosting collagen to plump and firm skin. Vitamins C, B5 + E protect against daily stressors; promote circulation & skin rejuvenation; and prevent puffiness, redness & discoloration.

🍊 New Large 8oz Bottle is Packed with the Best Superfoods- This Organic Face Wash is infused with only the best purifying botanicals: ROSEHIP (Anti-aging Powerhouse), MEADOWFOAM (Mega Moisturizer & Oil Regulator), and ALOE & SUNFLOWER (Super Skin Conditioners). They provide the antioxidants, vitamins & sugars needed to soften & nourish; control oil production; alleviate dry & damaged skin; & boost collagen to fill in fine lines & wrinkles for a Healthy, Smooth Complexion.

🍃 Deep but Gentle Cleansing - Unlike exfoliating scrubs with harsh chemicals, this Cleanser for All Skin Types uses natural botanicals to gently dissolve dull surface cells, impurities, and excess oils before they can settle and cause blemishes, irritation, or premature aging. Its Hypoallergenic & Non-comedogenic Formula purifies and clarifies without leaving skin dry, dull, or flakey. Your skin will be lovingly cleansed, conditioned, and better prepared for serums and moisturizers that follow.

🍊 We Back up Our Products with Unmatched Customer Service –We don't cut corners in our Products or Customer Care. We know you're a big deal and we treat you that way! All our products are backed by a risk-free 30-day guarantee. In addition to being risk-free, this cleanser is Paraben-free, Phthalate-free, Sulfate-free, and Cruelty-free (never tested on animals). Compare it to more expensive Face Exfoliators, Facial Scrubs, Exfoliating Cleansers, Soaps, Vegan Face Cleansers, or Soy Cleansers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Highest antioxidant of any plant. Purifies cleanses,, and clarifies while increasing skin elasticity, hydration, and tone. Protect skin from daily stressors and UV rays, while brightening, revitalizing, and balancing skin skin complexion. Superior purifying, clarifying and healing qualities soothe, tone, and condition skin for a healthy radiant complexion. Vitamins and natural acids protect, hydrate, and soften skin at a deep cellular level. Super hydrators lock in moisture to keep skin fresh and dewy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite face wash. The consistency is thick and feels great in hands and on face. It lathers well, smells pleasant, and makes my face so clear. It also seems to do a good job of cleaning my face well. It's my to to now for a fresh face!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle for combination skin
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy at first because it’s more expensive than the ones I buy. But it’s hard to find a good face wash that’s not too drying, but also removes oil and cleans pores. This works great on me. I like the creamy dense texture. Only a small pea-size amount is enough for a regular face wash. The cost might come out just about the same as cheaper ones considering this. But this one has better quality. I also like that it comes in a pump dispenser instead of the type that you have to squeeze out from the bottle. I will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the way it feels!
reviews.reviewText: This face wash goes on gentle, smells good and makes my face feel so soft and clean! Will definitely continue to use this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has been great for my daily routine. It smells good and is very creamy and cleanses my skin. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: makes your skin soft and smooth. Good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great face cleanser!
reviews.reviewText: It didn’t dry out my face like other cleansers. Left my face feeling smooth and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Made my skin feel refreshed and silky smooth. 10/10 would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I expected this to be a little less drying. My skin is extremely dry after washing my face. Something I never thought I'd say about any product. But as I'm getting older, I'm finding more and more that many face washes are very drying. I wanted to love this because the scent and the creamy texture are lovely. But it just doesn't work for me.
